New Records: Jamie Leweling scored the winning goal on his international debut
Key Match Events: Germany's Tim Kleindienst and Maximilian Mittelstaedt had chances to score
Xavi Simons' shot bounced off the bar
Mittelstaedt saw his deflected effort sail narrowly wide of the post
Oliver Baumann preserved the lead by punching a powerful Doneyll Malen shot wide
Pre-Game Insights: Julian Nagelsmann said the first half was exceptionally good
Ronald Koeman said he was not satisfied with the performance and the team was better, faster and physically stronger
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann said Germany fully deserved the win and now wants to win the remaining matches
Ronald Koeman said the team lost too many balls in the midfield and went too far back
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany are top on 10 points from four matches and guaranteed a place in the last eight
The Dutch are five points behind in second ahead of Hungary on goal difference
Bosnia are bottom with one point after losing 2-0 to the Hungarians
